.editorconfig:
# EditorConfig is awesome: https://EditorConfig.org

# top-most EditorConfig file
root = true

[*]
indent_style = space
indent_size = 4
end_of_line = lf
charset = utf-8
trim_trailing_whitespace = false
insert_final_newline = false
.gitignore:
.env
.vscode
**/*.pdf
dist
node_modules
false

# test results / coverage
coverage
junit.xml
